data.title: CDFA Releases the Proposed Regulations for the Cannabis Appellations Program
data.excerpt:
Hello CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing Stakeholders:
The California Department of Food and Agriculture (CDFA) released the proposed regulations today for the appellations of origin for cannabis.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
